00062 #ifndef STACK_H
00063 #define STACK_H
00064 
00065 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00066 #include <config.h>
00067 
00068 typedef struct stack_elmt
00069 {
00070   void *ptr;
00071   struct stack_elmt *next;
00072   struct stack_elmt *prev;
00073 }
00074 StackElmt;
00075 
00076 typedef struct stack_hdr
00077 {
00078   StackElmt *ptr;
00079   StackElmt *top;
00080   StackElmt *bottom;
00081 }
00082 Stack;
00083 
00084 #define _Stack_Ptr_Reset(stack,t)       { \
00085                                           stack->ptr = stack->top; \
00086                                           t = stack->ptr; \
00087                                         }
00088 
00089 #define _Stack_Find_Next(stack,n)       { Stack *tmp;   \
00090                                           if ( tmp != NULL )  { \
00091                                               tmp = stack->ptr->next; \
00092                                               stack->ptr = tmp;  \
00093                                           } \
00094                                           n = tmp; \
00095                                         }
00096 
00097 #define _Stack_Top(stack)       ((stack->top) ? stack->top->ptr : (void *)-1)
00098 #define _Stack_Elmt_Data(elmt)  ((elmt) ? elmt->ptr : (void *)-1)
00099 
00100 #ifdef __cplusplus
00101 extern "C"
00102 {
00103 #endif
00104 
00105   extern Stack *New_Stack (void);
00106   extern StackElmt *New_Stack_Elmt (void);
00107   extern void Free_Stack_Elmt (StackElmt * ptr);
00108   extern Stack *Free_Stack (Stack * stack);
00109   extern void Clear_Stack (Stack * stack);
00110   extern void Push_Top (Stack * stack, void *ptr);
00111   extern void Push_Bot (Stack * stack, void *ptr);
00112   extern void *Pop (Stack * stack);
00113   extern void *Stack_Top (Stack * stack);
00114   extern StackElmt *Stack_Find (Stack * stack, void *ptr);
00115   extern StackElmt *Stack_Ptr_Reset (Stack * stack);
00116   extern void Stack_Ptr_Set (Stack * stack, StackElmt * ptr);
00117   extern StackElmt *Stack_Find_Next (Stack * stack);
00118   extern void Delete_Stack (Stack * stack, StackElmt * ptr);
00119   extern void *Stack_Elmt_Data (StackElmt * elmt);
00120   extern void Stack_Print (Stack * stack);
00121 
00122 #ifdef __cplusplus
00123 }
00124 #endif
00125 
00126 #endif                          /* STACK_H */
